scripts.deploy: cdk deploy movement-pass-configuration-v1 --require-approval never --profile movement-pass && cdk deploy movement-pass-certificates-v1 --require-approval never --profile movement-pass && cdk deploy movement-pass-jwt-v1 --require-approval never --profile movement-pass && cdk deploy movement-pass-photos-v1 --require-approval never --profile movement-pass && cdk deploy movement-pass-database-v1 --require-approval never --profile movement-pass
scripts.destroy: cdk destroy movement-pass-database-v1 --profile movement-pass && cdk destroy movement-pass-photos-v1 --profile movement-pass && cdk destroy movement-pass-jwt-v1 --profile movement-pass  && cdk destroy movement-pass-certificates-v1 --profile movement-pass && cdk destroy movement-pass-configuration-v1 --profile movement-pass
